patthana15.77:1.1: Saraṇaṁ dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana15.77:2.1: Saraṇaṁ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana15.77:3.1: Araṇaṁ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naaraṇo nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
